name: Montant et mode de paiement égaux
Montant égaux et date dans les fourchettes (15J)
query: moveLine?.debit.equals(credit) && moveLine?.credit.equals(debit) && ((moveLine?.dueDate <= valueDate?.plusDays(15) && moveLine?.dueDate >=valueDate?.minusDays(15)) || (moveLine?.date <= valueDate?.plusDays(15) && moveLine?.date >=valueDate?.minusDays(15)) || (moveLine?.dueDate <= operationDate?.plusDays(15) && moveLine?.dueDate >=operationDate?.minusDays(15)) || (moveLine?.date <= operationDate?.plusDays(15) && moveLine?.date >=operationDate?.minusDays(15)))

name: Montant (5%) et date dans les fourchettes (15J)
query: moveLine?.debit >= debit * 0.95 && moveLine?.debit <= debit * 1.05 && moveLine?.credit >= credit * 0.95 && moveLine?.credit <= credit * 1.05 && ((moveLine?.dueDate <= valueDate?.plusDays(15) && moveLine?.dueDate >=valueDate?.minusDays(15)) || (moveLine?.date <= valueDate?.plusDays(15) && moveLine?.date >=valueDate?.minusDays(15)) || (moveLine?.dueDate <= operationDate?.plusDays(15) && moveLine?.dueDate >=operationDate?.minusDays(15)) || (moveLine?.date <= operationDate?.plusDays(15) && moveLine?.date >=operationDate?.minusDays(15)))
